1.title: Halo
1.description:
Halo is a powerful bluetooth speaker having a minimalistic design. It has a unique way in which the user interacts to control the speaker.

Halo has a capacitive Touch Gesture Control Slider which recognizes finger gestures for all the speaker controls. No need of volume knobs and physical buttons.

Just touch to control.

Halo comes with a bright and high contrast white LCD display to view your track information. It shows Artist and Track Position too. Many colors to choose from. What color is your favorite?

2.title: Fun Packaging Design
2.description:
Redesign of chocolate packaging for kids, creating an element of surprise.

The challenge was to have a fresh new and playful design on the market to attract kids as the primary customers.

3.title: Coffee Grinder
3.description:
Every day we use ground coffee to make our beloved cup of Java. Yet have you ever stopped and wondered why we use ground coffee as opposed to just whole beans? Or why the size of the grind matters? Or why some people look at you with utter disbelief when you tell them that you use pre-ground coffee?

Always grind your coffee freshly,just before brewing!

4.title: keep
4.description:
A cool new way to keep your stuff organized right on your desk.

It will save you from the clutter that your creative projects generate and let you focus on the task on hand.

5.title: AirPur
5.description:
Contaminated air even in household environment has been proven harmful for breathing. Impurities in air can cause respiratory diseases like asthama and also symptoms like fatigue. We need a solution which is portable, easy to use and effective in purifying the air in our home and workplace.

Airpur, a portable air purifier that can be carried around the place and used effortlessly. It has a radial fan with filters for cleaning all types of contaminants in the air and giving fresh and healthy air to breathe to your family. It comes with a rechargeable battery.

6.title: Form Exploration
6.description: Some explorations in 3D form. Understanding the elements and making compositions using cooncpts of figure and ground, balance, visual celebration and expressions. Worked with paper, styrofom and plaster.

7.title: Outdoor Furniture
7.description: This design project had an objective to design cost effective and durable furniture for a Cafe at my design school. Careful explorations into materials and processes was the key.

8.title: 3D Print Ring
8.description: A parametric design for a ring as a part of a quick 3D printed jewelry assignment.

9.title: Mouse Concept
9.description: Inspired by Neo-Futurism, this mouse concept was designed in a 2 day project with the objective of form exploration and expression.

10.title: Sketchbook
10.description: Some ideation and exploratory sketches from my sketchbook.

11.title: Medshare
11.description:
Medshare is designed for dependent patients who need constant care and reminders for taking medicines on time.

Medshare is IoT based product which brings the dependent patients closer to their loved ones. The prescriptions can be fed into the device and are dispensed with reminders on time. You get notifications when the patient takes or misses the medication, so you can take batter care.
